collection_holder_name: West Campus Library, University Archives, Hofstra University
pageContext.collection_description: Contains papers and correspondence documenting various aspects of Chappell's radio career, including scripts for Logic In Science, 1934, WLTH, For Worriers Only, 1937, WMCA and Psychological Forum of the Air, 1937-1938, WNEW. Also includes proposed scripts for other programs, audience measurement papers, 1945-1946, testimony before the FCC, 1943, and material relating to advertising.
